com.google.gwt.dev.shell
Class BrowserWidgetHostChecker

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.dev.shell.BrowserWidgetHostChecker

public class BrowserWidgetHostChecker
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains utility functions to do whitelist/blacklist handling.

This method checks the host to see if it is in the supplied set of regexes.

Parameters:

Returns:

This method computes the host regular expression for the given url.

Parameters:

Returns:
the regex that matches the host in the url

matchBlacklisted

public static java.lang.String matchBlacklisted(java.lang.String url)
This method returns non-null if the host is forbidden.

Parameters:
url - the URL to be verified
Returns:
returns the regex that specified the host matches the blacklist

matchWhitelisted

public static java.lang.String matchWhitelisted(java.lang.String url)
This method returns null if the host is admissible, provided it is not on the blacklist.

Parameters:
url - the URL to be verified
Returns:
returns the regex that specified the host matches the whitelist

notifyBlacklistedHost

public static void notifyBlacklistedHost(java.lang.String blacklistRuleFound,
                                         java.lang.String url,
                                         TreeLogger header,
                                         TreeLogger.Type msgType)
This method formats a message, and logs it to the treelogger, stating that the url was blocked.

Parameters:
url - the URL that was disallowed
header - the treelogger under which these messages will be put
msgType - either a caution or an error

notifyUntrustedHost

public static void notifyUntrustedHost(java.lang.String url,
                                       TreeLogger header,
                                       TreeLogger.Type msgType)
This method formats a message, and logs it to the treelogger, stating that the url was not trusted.

Parameters:
url - the URL that provoked the dialog box
header - the treelogger under which these messages will be put
msgType - either a caution or an error

whitelistRegexes

public static boolean whitelistRegexes(java.lang.String regexes)
This method whitelists the supplied String of regexes, separated by comma or space.

Parameters:
regexes - the regexes to be allowed

whitelistURL

public static void whitelistURL(java.lang.String url)
This method whitelists the supplied URL, and any that share the same host.

Parameters:
url - the host to be allowed
